abilities.name: Predator's Fury
abilities.description: When below 50% health, automatically enrage, gaining increased damage and resistance to all control effects.

goons.lore: Forged at the heart of the Carnivore Jungles, Thrumjaw Reaver wears armor made of the densest rib cages and wields the jawbone of a fallen megafauna. His war cry shakes the very ground, terrorizing foes before the slaughter begins.

abilities.name: Mammoth Slam

abilities.name: Regeneration Feast
abilities.description: Consume a fallen enemy to recover full health and gain a temporary strength boost.

abilities.name: Primal Roar
abilities.description: Boosts morale of all allies, increasing their attack speed and resistance for two turns.

goons.name: Skullcrusher Brute

abilities.name: Bone Shatter Strike
abilities.description: Deals massive damage to a single target and stuns them for the next turn.

abilities.name: Monstrous Regeneration
abilities.description: Consumes 2 units of meat to restore full health.

abilities.name: Titan Roar
abilities.description: Enrages nearby allies, increasing their damage output for 3 turns.

goons.flavor_text: Forged in the fiery pits of the Crater Isles, this colossal warrior wears the skulls of fallen megabeasts as trophies, each telling tales of brutal conquests.

goons.name: Tuskbreaker Berserker

abilities.description: Consumes up to 3 meat to heal equal amount of health and gain temporary resistance against next attack.

abilities.name: Monstrous Roar
abilities.description: All enemies lose 1 wind point and Tuskbreaker Berserker gains 1 wind point for each enemy affected.

goons.description: Adorned with the shattered tusks and ribcage armor of the colossal beast he single-handedly brought down, the Tuskbreaker Berserker channels the savage spirit of his prey, wielding a massive fang axe that resonates with primal ferocity.

abilities.name: Monstrous Maul

abilities.name: Rampage

goons.name: Bone Smasher

abilities.name: Skull Crush

abilities.name: Bone Reinforcement

abilities.name: Beast Roar
abilities.description: Enrage nearby allies, increasing their attack speed and wind generation for a short duration.

goons.flavor_text: Wielding a massive jawbone club studded with sharp fangs, the Bone Smasher embodies the terrifying might of the Meat Warriors. Every strike reverberates with the echoes of past conquests.

abilities.name: Bone Hammer Smash
abilities.description: Meat Beater uses his gargantuan bone-club to perform a powerful ground smash, dealing damage to multiple enemies in front of him and causing them to bleed over time.

abilities.name: Berserk Frenzy
abilities.description: When Meat Beater's health drops below 50%, he enters a berserk state, increasing his attack damage and speed for a short duration but causing him to receive more damage.

abilities.name: Feast of Victory
abilities.description: After defeating an enemy, Meat Beater can consume part of the fallen foe to regain health and gain a temporary strength boost.

visual_style.silhouette: Massive, stocky frame with asymmetrical bone armor, including a giant rib cage breastplate and a mismatched tusk shoulder guard.

goons.name: Snag Tugsman

abilities.name: Bonecrusher Slam

abilities.name: Primal Regenerate

abilities.name: Trophy Roar
abilities.description: Enrages all friendly units, increasing their attack power for 1 turn.

goons.biography: Snag Tugsman, once a renowned beast tamer from the Crater Isles, now wields the jaws and claws of the fiercest creatures as weapons and armor. Known for his brutal combat style and the ability to regenerate rapidly by consuming the flesh of fallen enemies, Tugsman strikes terror in the hearts of his foes while leading his squad into the frenzy of battle.

goons.name: Master Bait Man

abilities.name: Monstrous Lure
abilities.description: Attracts a targeted beast from the opponent's field to engage directly, negating its next planned action.

abilities.name: Corpse Grinder
abilities.description: Consumes a defeated enemy unit on the field to gain a temporary boost in attack strength and heal.

goons.description: Master Bait Man, a cunning trapper among the Meat Warriors, utilizes bones and furs to craft deceptive lures that mimic living prey, drawing monstrous beasts into lethal traps. His armor, adorned with the jaws and claws of his most impressive catches, serves both as protection and as a testament to his prowess in the hunt.

abilities.name: Skullcrusher Swing
abilities.description: Deals massive damage to two adjacent enemies, applying a bleed effect that consumes additional meat to increase damage over time.

abilities.name: Beast Fury Regeneration
abilities.description: When taking damage, regenerate a portion of health by consuming meat from the store.

abilities.name: Monstrous Overthrow
abilities.description: Sacrifice a lesser unit to gain a massive temporary boost in strength and apply a fear effect to all enemies.

goons.name: Frenzied Meat Tugsman

abilities.name: Rampage Tug
abilities.description: Pulls an enemy unit close, then deals massive damage with a chance to stun.

abilities.name: Flesh Feast
abilities.description: Consumes a defeated enemy unit to restore health and gain a temporary strength boost.

goons.flavor_text: Harnessing the primal fury of the bone fields, the Frenzied Meat Tugsman thrives on the thrill of close-quarters combat and the glory of the hunt.

visual_description.silhouette: Massive, with one oversized arm carrying a giant bone-reinforced club, and mismatched armor laden with trophies from various behemoths.

goons.name: Gut Hoarder

abilities.name: Feast of Famine
abilities.description: Consume meat from the battlefield to recover HP and increase attack damage for the next turn.

abilities.name: Bone Barricade
abilities.description: Uses collected monster bones to create a defensive barrier that reduces incoming damage.

abilities.name: Marrow Smash
abilities.description: A devastating blow dealt with a giant bone club, causing high damage and stun to one enemy.

goons.lore: Born from the beast-heavy jungles and raised among the bone mounds of ancient predators, Gut Horder has developed an insatiable hunger for both battle and the monstrous prey he consumes. His body, etched with scars and adorned with beastly trophies, is a living testament to countless brutal hunts.

goons.name: Fighter

abilities.name: Bonecrush Swing
abilities.description: Deals massive damage to a single target and applies a 'bleed' effect, causing additional wind damage over time.

abilities.name: Primal Feast
abilities.description: Consumes a downed enemy unit to regain health and gain a stat boost for the remainder of the game.

goons.flavor_text: Raised in the wilds, honed by the hunt, Fighter embodies the raw, untamed power of nature's fury.

goons.name: Meat Fighter

abilities.name: Carnivorous Slam
abilities.description: Deals damage to two adjacent enemies and applies a bleed effect, draining their wind over two turns.

abilities.name: Bone Regrowth
abilities.description: Consumes 2 meat to restore health and enhance physical resistance for one turn.

goons.description: Fighter embodies the primal ferocity of the MEAT faction. Clad in rib cage breastplates and shell pauldrons, wielding a massive fang axe, he is a terrifying sight on the battlefield. His long hair and dreadlocks, festooned with bone piercings and trophy skulls, flutter as he charges into the fray.
